name: ListSKU
description:
>ðŸ“˜ This API is part of the [Seller Portal Catalog](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/how-the-seller-portal-catalog-works--7pMB6YOt6YQDQQbzFB4Pxp). This functionality is in the Beta stage and can be discontinued at any moment at VTEX's discretion. VTEX will not be responsible for any instabilities caused by its use or discontinuity. If you have any questions, please contact [our Support Center](https://support.vtex.com/hc/en-us/requests). 

 Retrieves general information about all SKUs.

## Response body example

```json
{
    "data": [
        "1",
        "10",
        "11",
        "12",
        "13",
        "14",
        "15",
        "16",
        "19",
        "2",
        "20",
        "21",
        "22",
        "23",
        "24"
    ],
    "_metadata": {
        "total": 65,
        "from": 1,
        "to": 15
    }
}
```

Content-Type.description: Type of the content being sent.

Accept.description: HTTP Client Negotiation _Accept_ Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

from.description: The first page of the interval of the product list.

to.description: The last page of the interval of the product list.

$ul: **_metadata**: Information about the organization and exhibition of the SKU list.
**from**: The first page of the interval of the SKU list.
**to**: The last page of the interval of the SKU list.
**total**: Total of SKUs on the list.
**data**: List with information about the SKU.
